text:
A two-year-old girl abandoned in the bus stand here has been rescued by police and handed over to Childline.

District coordinator of Childline, S.Murugan, said as nobody came in search of the girl, she was handed over to Child Welfare Committee. The baby has been taken for a medical checkup to the Tiruvannamalai Medical College Hospital. She will be sent to a children’s home later.
title: Abandoned girl child rescued
